data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ado Onaiwu of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 4, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Ken Matsubara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Goal! Takaaki Shichi gives Yokohama FC a 1-0 lead.
Koki Saito with an assist there.
In the minute 10, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Yokohama FC drive into the zone and Kazunari Ichimi is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 13, Free kick Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Yokohama FC takes a corner from the right.
Goal! Masakazu Tashiro extends Yokohama FC's lead to 2-0.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
In the minute 19, Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Koki Saito's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Kida misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ado Onaiwu puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
In the minute 26, Yokohama FC drives forward and Kazunari Ichimi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Jun Amano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ryuji Sato awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Yokohama Marinos's Jun Amano misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Makito Ito is booked for the away team.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 32, Takuya Kida (Yokohama Marinos) gets a yellow card.
Yokohama FC pushes forward through Masakazu Tashiro, whose finish on goal is saved.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Ryuji Sato awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 40, Yokohama FC are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Yokohama FC a corner.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Shinnosuke Hatanaka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Ryuji Sato signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
In the minute 45, Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Takahiro Ogihara's finish is wide of the goal.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Yokohama FC a corner.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 52, Yokohama Marinos takes a corner from the right.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Ado Onaiwu's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Yokohama FC.
Ryuji Sato awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Tatsuki Seko of Yokohama FC smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 56, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
Ado Onaiwu (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Daizen Maeda (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a strike – but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 57, Yokohama Marinos are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Attention is being given to Yokohama FC’s Masakazu Tashiro and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 63, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Masakazu Tashiro has recovered and rejoins the match in Yokohama.
The home team replace Kazunari Ichimi with Yuji Senuma.
In the minute 64, Katsuhiro Nakayama is on a sub for Kosuke Saito for Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 65, Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Yokohama FC, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 66, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Daizen Maeda for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama Marinos make their first substitution with Ryuta Koike replacing Kota Mizunuma.
Kota Watanabe is replacing Takuya Kida for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's third substitution at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium with Yusuke Minagawa replacing Koki Saito.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 73, Yuji Senuma scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-1.
Great play from Kohei Tezuka to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 75, Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Yokohama FC.
Ryuta Koike of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Yokohama FC are whistled for offside.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 78, Ryuji Sato signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Maguinho (Yokohama FC) has received a yellow card from Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 80, Yokohama Marinos pushes forward through Jun Amano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Jun Amano with Eitaro Matsuda. This is the third substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a fourth substitution, with Takuya Wada replacing Makito Ito.
Yuki Otsu is on a sub for Daizen Maeda for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 86, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama Marinos pushes forward through Ado Onaiwu, whose finish on goal is saved.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Kazuyoshi Miura is replacing Takuya Matsuura for the home team.
The home team replace Maguinho with Kensuke Sato.
